      • srcFillBuffer

        protected FlowReturn srcFillBuffer(long offset,
                       int size,
                       Buffer buffer)
        Description copied from class: CustomSrc
        Used when you just want to fill a Buffer with data. The Buffer will be allocated and initialized by gstreamer.
